main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Dallas, Texas on 19 September 1954, involving objects shaped like stars with a blue-green color and no sound. The objects were observed moving horizontally from north to south before suddenly disappearing.
interesting points: The objects were described as shaped like stars and emitted a blue-green color, unlike any known aircraft at the time.
Radar contact was made with the object as it suddenly disappeared, but local authorities reported no contact with the moving object.
The UFO was observed moving fast without sound and appearing and disappearing. It was said to travel from horizon to horizon in about 1 second before disappearing without a trace.
A thorough investigation had not been conducted to determine other possible causes for the sighting, and no further action was considered necessary at the time.
The sighting was deemed unexplained, as no reason could be offered to explain what was observed, and it was something that could not be explained with the present knowledge.
sighted object: objects shaped like stars with a blue-green color and no sound
